landing.how_do_you_prefer_to_engage: How do you prefer to engage?
landing.hero_subtitle: An interactive engagement platform where voices come alive, ideas connect, and communities evolve.
landing.about_description: Inavora is designed to make every interaction meaningful. By combining AI assistance with interactive tools, we transform conversations into insights and connections into growth.
landing.engage_desc: Through live polls, quizzes and feedback with your audience.
landing.evolve_desc: Through data-driven growth and collective learning.
landing.interactive_engagement_desc: Bring conversations to life with polls, quizzes, Q&A and feedback that keeps everyone engaged.
landing.ai_assistance_desc: Get smart prompts, summaries and insights to guide discussions and decisions.
landing.community_connection_desc: Unite voices in classrooms, organizations and diaspora communities worldwide.
landing.growth_insights_desc: Turn data into progress with powerful analytics that helps ideas and people develop.
landing.education_desc: Provide teachers and students with interactive learning experiences.
landing.corporate_desc: Boost engagement and decision-making in teams, workshops and meetings.
landing.communities_desc: Connect diaspora voices and strengthen cultural, social and civic bonds.
landing.events_desc: Make conferences, webinars and gatherings truly interactive and memorable.
landing.start_free_upgrade: Start free, upgrade when you need to.
landing.more_than_tools: More than just tools - a movement of connection
landing.movement_description: Inavora isn't just another engagement app. It's the place where technology and humanity meet. We don't just collect answers - we create meaning. We don't just automate - we empower voices.
landing.platform_journey: Inavora is the platform where people unite to engage, connect and evolve.
landing.ready_start_journey: Ready to start your Inavora journey?
landing.join_movement: Join the movement of intelligent engagement. Transform how you learn, lead and connect.
landing.hero_description: Transform your presentations from monologues into conversations. Engage your audience in real-time with interactive slides that capture attention and foster participation.
landing.features_description: From real-time polling to collaborative brainstorming, Inavora provides all the tools you need to create memorable presentations.
landing.feature_real_time_description: See audience responses as they happen with live updating charts and word clouds.
landing.feature_variety_description: Choose from 10+ interactive slide types including polls, word clouds, Q&A, and more.
landing.feature_insights_description: Gain valuable insights from your audience with detailed analytics and reporting.
landing.feature_easy_description: Create stunning interactive presentations in minutes with our intuitive drag-and-drop editor.
landing.templates_description: Jumpstart your next presentation with our professionally designed templates.
landing.template_poll_description: Perfect for quick surveys and gathering instant feedback.
landing.template_brainstorm_description: Ideal for collecting ideas and fostering creative discussions.
landing.template_quiz_description: Test knowledge and engage your audience with fun quizzes.
landing.testimonial_quote: Inavora transformed how we conduct training sessions. Engagement increased by 300% and feedback quality improved dramatically.
landing.cta_description: Join thousands of presenters who are creating interactive experiences with Inavora.

footer.empowering_education: Empowering education and meetings with innovative interactive solutions for the next generation.

about.hero_description: We're on a mission to banish boring meetings and passive lectures. Inavora turns silent audiences into active participants through real-time interaction.
about.experience_description: Transforming how you connect, one slide at a time.
about.values_description: We are builders, designers, and storytellers dedicated to making communication more human. These principles guide how we build Inavora.
about.values_quote: When everyone contributes, everyone learns. We build bridges between speakers and listeners.
about.values_engagement_first_desc: We believe active minds learn better and work smarter. We banish boring by making every interaction count.
about.values_radical_simplicity_desc: Technology should remove barriers, not create them. We build powerful tools that are intuitive for everyone.
about.values_inclusivity_desc: Every voice matters. We create safe, accessible spaces for honest feedback and diverse perspectives.
about.values_innovation_desc: We are constantly evolving, finding new ways to bridge the gap between presenters and audiences.
about.cta_description: Join thousands of presenters who are creating memorable, interactive experiences with Inavora.

institution_admin.no_faq_results: No FAQs found matching your search.
institution_admin.faq_how_to_add_users: How do I add users to my institution?
institution_admin.faq_how_to_add_users_answer: You can add users individually through the "Add User" button in the Users tab, or use the bulk import feature to add multiple users at once via CSV file.
institution_admin.faq_subscription_renewal: How do I renew my subscription?
institution_admin.faq_subscription_renewal_answer: Navigate to the Subscription & Billing tab and click "Renew Subscription" when your subscription is about to expire or has expired. You can pay securely through Razorpay.
institution_admin.faq_user_limit: What happens when I reach my user limit?
institution_admin.faq_user_limit_answer: When you reach your user limit, you'll see a warning notification. You can add more users by paying for additional user slots. Each additional user costs ₹499.
institution_admin.faq_custom_branding: How do I customize my institution branding?
institution_admin.faq_custom_branding_answer: Go to the Custom Branding tab where you can set your primary and secondary colors and upload a logo (via file upload or URL). These branding settings will be applied across all institution admin pages, giving your platform a consistent, personalized look and feel.
institution_admin.faq_api_keys: How do I create and use API keys?
institution_admin.faq_api_keys_answer: Navigate to API Management tab, click "Create API Key", give it a descriptive name, and copy the generated key. Use this key to authenticate API requests to your institution endpoints.
institution_admin.faq_webhooks: What are webhooks and how do I set them up?
institution_admin.faq_webhooks_answer: Webhooks allow you to receive real-time notifications when events occur in your institution. Go to API Management, create a webhook, provide your endpoint URL, and select which events you want to receive.
institution_admin.faq_export_data: How can I export my institution data?
institution_admin.faq_export_data_answer: You can export users, presentations, and analytics data from the respective tabs. Click the export button and choose your preferred format (JSON, CSV, or Excel).
institution_admin.faq_security_settings: How do I configure security settings?
institution_admin.faq_security_settings_answer: Go to the Settings tab and navigate to Security Settings. Here you can configure password policies, enable two-factor authentication, set session timeouts, and require email verification.
institution_admin.documentation_coming_soon: Documentation is coming soon! For now, please refer to the FAQ section below or contact support for assistance.
institution_admin.quick_link_info:
To manage users:

1. Go to the Users tab
2. Click "Add User" to add individual users
3. Use "Bulk Import" to add multiple users via CSV
4. Click the delete icon to remove users

Check the FAQ section for more details!
institution_admin.settings_info:
To configure settings:

1. Go to the Settings tab
2. Use General Settings to enable/disable features
3. Use Security Settings to configure password policies and 2FA
4. Click "Save Settings" to apply changes

Check the FAQ section for more details!
institution_admin.api_info:
To use API and webhooks:

1. Go to the API Management tab
2. Create API keys for authentication
3. Set up webhooks to receive event notifications
4. Select which events should trigger your webhooks

Check the FAQ section for more details!
institution_admin.analytics_info:
To view analytics:

1. Go to the Analytics tab
2. Select a time period (7, 30, 90 days, or 1 year)
3. View charts and statistics
4. Export data using the export button

Check the FAQ section for more details!
